Package weka.filters.unsupervised.attribute

Class Dl4jMlpFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.filters.Filter
      • weka.filters.SimpleFilter
        • weka.filters.SimpleBatchFilter
          • weka.filters.unsupervised.attribute.Dl4jMlpFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, weka.core.CapabilitiesHandler, weka.core.CapabilitiesIgnorer, weka.core.CommandlineRunnable, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.RevisionHandler
    public class Dl4jMlpFilter
extends weka.filters.SimpleBatchFilter
implements weka.core.OptionHandler
    Weka filter that uses a neural network trained via Dl4jMlpClassifier as feature transformation.
